item.title: Making A Butt0n Linkable In C#?
item.dc:creator: @Exception Exception
item.description:
@Exception wrote:

[quote=“io9, post:2, topic:153451”]WHy not just use a LinkLabel? Or, add a click handler to the button, and add the following to it

System.Diagnostics.Process proc = new System.Diagnostics.Process(); proc.EnableRaisingEvents=false; proc.StartInfo.FileName="http://link.goes/here/"; proc.Start();[/quote]
Tbh,
System.Diagnostics.Process.Start(“http://www.mylink.com”);
would do the same thing, in 3 less lines of code…

Read full topic
item.source: Making A Butt0n Linkable In C#?
